meanings.definition: A group of people who associate closely and often exclusively with one another, especially for social or criminal purposes.
meanings.sent1: The gangs of friends always played together at the park.
meanings.sent2: The city was known for its dangerous gangs involved in illegal activities.
meanings.sent3: The gangs of kids at the birthday party were having a great time playing games.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle, the gangs of monkeys moved through the trees with ease.
meanings.sent5: The gangs of students in the cafeteria made it a lively and bustling place.

meanings.definition: To form a group or gang.
meanings.sent1: We decided to gangs together to work on the project.
meanings.sent2: The birds will gangs together to migrate south for the winter.
meanings.sent3: Let's gangs up and go on an adventure this weekend!
meanings.sent4: The ants gangs to carry the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent5: The children gangs to build a sandcastle at the beach.
